org.coniks.coniks_server

Class ServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.ServerConfig

  • public class ServerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets various configuration parameters for a ConiksServer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerConfig() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getEpochInterval()
      Returns the EPOCH_INTERVAL used to indicate the frequence of CONIKS directory updates.
      static java.lang.String getFullName()
      Returns the full server NAME used to address the server over the network.
      static java.lang.String getKeystorePassword()
      Returns the password to the server's keystore KEYSTORE_PWD.
      static java.lang.String getKeystorePath()
      Returns the path to the server's keystore KEYSTORE_PATH.
      static java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the short server NAME used to refer to the server.

      Returns the PORT number at which the server is listening.

      Returns the server's STARTUP_TIME.

      Returns the password to the server's truststore TRUSTSTORE_PWD.

      Returns the path to the server's truststore TRUSTSTORE_PATH.

        public static long getStartupTime()

      • readServerConfig

        public static boolean readServerConfig(java.io.File configFile,
                       boolean isFullOp)
        Set a ConiksServer's configuration according to the parameters in configFile. The main server has already checked that configFile exists, but the parameters in the File may still be malformed. If the server is being tested, this will skip the keystore and truststore parameters.
        Parameters:
        configFile - the server configuration file
        isFullOp - indicates whether the server is being run in full operation mode or testing mode
        Returns:
        true if the config file can be read in successfully, false if an exception occurs, which will cause the server to halt.
